thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 14 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Iff Reports Fourth Quarter & Full Year 2017 Results

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Iff Reports Fourth Quarter & Full Year 2017 Results
text:
International Flavors & Fragrances Inc:
* IFF REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER & FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $0.51 * QTRLY NET SALES $854.6 MILLION VERSUS $762.6 MILLION * SEES FULL YEAR 2018 CURRENCY NEUTRAL SALES GROWTH OF 3 PERCENT TO 5 PERCENT
* SEES FULL YEAR 2018 CURRENCY NEUTRAL EPS GROWTH OF 4 PERCENT TO 6 PERCENT
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.31, REVENUE VIEW $831.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $6.31, REVENUE VIEW $3.55 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* AS A RESULT TAX ACT, CO RECORDED PROVISIONAL NET CHARGE OF $139 MILLION IN QUARTER ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
